name: IntelligentMoneyMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Time is money, so invest in every minute. Learn how to save both time and money with some laughter along the way. We minimize financial stress to maximize your life by blending traditional finance, behavioral finance, and values-based finance into a mercifully short and fun podcast. Learn from Hans Blake, CFA, CPA who founded Intelligent Investing after managing $350M at his former firm as he interviews experts in a variety of fields. To be a part of the show and get your financial questions answered, send an email to: amanda@investedwithyou.com or visit www.investedwithyou.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
